website_summaries.verdict: The best budget Xbox gaming headset that offers more advanced features than other options.
pros: Large over-the-ear cups provide plenty of sound isolation for a pure gaming experience
Noise-cancellation microphone offers clear voice delivery without distortion
cons: The plastic exterior is prone to dents and scratches from heavy gaming or accidental drops

customer_reviews.title: This headset is awesome! 5 star!
customer_reviews.text: This is the one to buy it works for Xbox one, PS4 and pc(with a adapter). It works 10 times better than my Xbox one headset that cost me 100+ dollars while this one was around 20 dollars and has cool bright led lights. The sound and voice are great. Has a volume controller and mute button on the cable that are handy. VersionTech costumer service is excellent if you have any issue quick and responsive. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: First off I want to say Im using this for a PS4. Which it works great. Sound quality is good, love the volume control knob, but I do have a couple gripes. First the microphone is located on the left side only and isn't able to be moved. Secondly, the headset is one of the ones that lights up but it's powered through an extremely short USB plug. So on PS4, in order to use the lighted feature, you'd either need a USB extension or be sitting face to face with the system. It does function fine without the lights being used though, it just has an annoying dangling USB cord.
customer_reviews.author: TravTheDude

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Headset
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it a couple of times with my PS4 VR setup and it was comfortable to use. Fairly light with well cushioned ear pieces. have not had occasion to use the mike but it folds up and out of the way and blends in with the blue black chrome design. Very nice looking almost futuristic. Has a long cord which I have not had to use while connected to my VR headset. The mike design is really neat almost 1/2 wide and 6" long and curved.. A lot of thought has gone into the design of this headset.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones. The sound quality is great; they provide excellent surround sound, and the mic is clear and my friends can hear me just fine. The noise cancelling works great as my friends couldn’t hear my mom talking to me. I love how the lights illuminate, especially with my bedroom light off. They really are great headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with this headset, overall. Considering it costs the same or slightly less than the cheap, stock headsets that come with the Xbox One, this is a really good deal. The earpieces go around both ears, and the sound quality is good. The only two things that I don't quite like about it are that I can't hear my voice coming through the headset, so I always feel like I have to raise my voice when playing with friends. And secondly, my brother told me my voice is a little quiet at times, when we play. Other than that, it's a solid headset, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. FELLA

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, feels great, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They go with my RGB Mac setup super well. They're super comfortable and have huge ear cups. Like, huge. I was kind of shocked when I pulled them out of the box because they're so big. The in-line volume adjuster feels a little cheap, but that aside, the headphones feel super great! They have a nice gloss finish.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: I was contacted by the seller and they offered to replace it no charge. That is extremely kind of them to do. I assume i recieved s faulty one as it was a recommended best seller. I recommend this seller. Very kind. Lasted like a month. Worked amazing when I got it. Super comfortable and nice looking. Slowly started losing parts of sound , could hear one thing like music but not people talking. As of 10 minutes ago won't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby M.

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: My son picked these out to use on his Nintendo Switch and he loves them! Noise cancellation must be on point because he can’t hear me calling for dinner or time for homework anymore! 😅 The surround sound is loud, you can conveniently control the volume from the cord though. We did have some trouble with the mic at first, but it was user error (customer support is above par 👍🏻). If you aren’t tech savvy like myself and have trouble with getting the mic to work on a Nintendo Switch go into the settings on the game being played and turn the mic setting to “open mic” instead of “on” and this will fix that issue!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good budget headset.
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. Gives you loud and clear distinctive sounds for gaming. I could tell where the opponents were before my team can thru sound alone with this headset. Crisp clear sounds. Listen to music on it and you will also notice a better difference as well. Sturdy construction, it has taken some abuse but still works fine. No complaints. The wire has taken the most abuse, and it holds still. Not saying you can pull it and such, but accidental twists and light yanks shouldn't hurt it - still have to care for it. Sound cancelation isn't as awesome as other higher end headsets, but this one does fairly well above average.
customer_reviews.author: Pikato

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This company went way above and beyond for us. About three months after the first pair was ordered, they just stopped working for no aparant reason. I left a poor review on here and moved on. Immediately afterwards I was contacted by the seller and they offered to replace the headset free of charge. I was so busy that I completely forgot about it and they kept emailing me for 6mo! They tracked me down and patiently waited for me to get back to them (as I had moved by then) and still replaced my headphones for free! I've had them a few months now, they work perfectly, are comfortable and have excellent sound quality. This company is great. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah C

customer_reviews.title: The best wireless headset for online gaming
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this headset he is new to online games and he is young so i did not want to spend $100 for a gaming headset So i found this one here on Amazon for less than $20 He is very excited about this As soon as he gets home from school he runs to get this headset and is playing Friday the 13th all day long This is excellent quality for a great inexpensive price You will not be disappointed here Dont worry about it being inexperienced The quality is better than some of the headsets i looked at im best buy for $100 Buy this one and save $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$
customer_reviews.author: Keith C.

customer_reviews.title: Loving this headset!
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset a while ago, and I still use it till this day! My 2 year old son grabs it and messes with it, pulls the mic and puts it on his head, it's still holding up! 3D sound, so you can hear people sneaking up from behind you in games. Noise cancelling so you can't hear people sneaking up from behind you in real life. When these headphones are on my head, people know not to talk to me because I can't hear a word they say lol I highly recommend!! I also want to purchase another set for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Arias

customer_reviews.title: They're comfortable, the ear pads don't get hot while wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter, she loves them. They're comfortable, the ear pads don't get hot while wearing them, the sound is great. The only problem with these is that they need a separate USB connection for the lights to turn on. The lights will not turn on while being used on an XBox One controller. I ordered these with Prime, and they guaranteed two day delivery, I received these four days later.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal.
customer_reviews.text: I will let my son who is 11 years old write the review. THE PRICE WAS ACCORDING TO THE PRODUCT, THE HEADPHONE IS GOOD LOOKING, AND I LIKE THE MICROPHONE WAS INDEED GOOD. . THE SOUND QUALITY WAS GOOD, THE NOISE CANCELLING WAS WORKING GREAT, AND FINALLY THEY R VERY COMFORTABLE TO WEAR.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: I just got my new Gaming Headset Couldn't wait to try them out .... Great sound , their Comfortable , like the type of cord they used . Love Blue lights and I didn't have to pay whole lot for this Gaming Headset , bought on amazon Headset Holder that swivels , to where can hide Gaming Headset under desk. I will admit in what one Reviewer said that USB for Blue lights are bit short. Can always buy USB EXTENISION CORD ....I bought this Gaming Headset base in Reviews .
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Seay

customer_reviews.title: Great for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I am only writing this review for one reason: my ears. These headphones work great, sound great, and have a decent noise cancelation. However, i found them extremely uncomfortable to wear for an long period of time. They have a mesh with small circles covering the ear piece that just rubs against your ears while on. My ears aren't even big so I was pretty annoyed. I had to shred cotton balls and put them over that mesh in order to wear them comfortably. Honestly now they are perfect. Hopefully in their new products they made this simple change to make it more comfortable for every. 6/10 recommend as is, 10/10 recommend with cotton ball ear muffs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a few weeks then stopped working. Ordered a replacement, same thing happened again. First the mic stopped working, then the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gillooly

customer_reviews.title: STRONG good SOUND quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He’s broken ALL of the others. These have stayed STRONG since day one and so far it’s been many months. I don’t see that changing any time soon. I had to feel and hear for myself and the sound quality was seriously clear and I couldn’t hear much outside the earphones at all. I did a good job picking out these. The lights are very nice but it has to be plugged into a battery pack to play while it’s lit.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ann Love

customer_reviews.title: This is a Beefy Headphone
customer_reviews.text: I love this headphone! It may be huge, but it does so much for what i need it for. I use this for all my gaming needs on all platforms. I only have 2 issues. First the sound canceling. I understand why, but it's funny that I literally can't hear anything outside of the headphones. So I end up having one ear uncovered and it just feels awkward when I do that. The other issue is that, there is a light up option for the headphones, but because of the cable being short I usually have to be pretty close to the TV and my console to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought it during a Amazon deal for use with Skype with my Pixel 3XL as the regular mic cuts out if other people talk at the same time as me. The quality for this purpose is great. I haven't used it on another device so I can't speak for gaming or the light up feature as it's been years since I played multiplayer outside of D20. With the pandemic my game group is using roll20 for maps and Skype for audio chat. Works great. Can still here my AC and cats begging for food though it's muffled.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Annoying static buzz sound and poor mic quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these after many reviews said the miuc quality and sound was good. Yea apparently not my 20$ sades headset was noticeably better. The people I game with complained quite alot about my "new" mic. The main reason they were bad though was the constant faint static sound the earphones constantly emit. I'm not a picky person generally but yeaaaaa that got very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Elodie

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy. Braided cable is great
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say I am impressed by these. I read the reviews and some video reviews but I was still unsure. Having used it for a couple of days I can attest to the quality. Solid and sturdy. Braided cable is great. Mic has worked fine and its very comfy on my big head. My ears sweat less with these then with the SONY Gold Wireless(which broke from a drop so thats why I went with these...tired of charging battery too) The sound quality is very good. A little better has the Sony brand especially in the low end. Inline volume control is very smooth. Really is a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband. Hes been through several headsets playing Fortnite on his playstation. The kids have been pretty rough on his headsets and they always tear up. Hes bought some expensive sets in the past, so to prove to him that he doesnt have to spend a lot of money for quality I bought this set not telling him the price. This set arrived much nicer and sturdier than the $50+ sets hes bought in the past. He guessed that I paid $100 for them, and I let him believe that for a while until he logged on to Amazon to order something else. These have lasted him much longer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Headset
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who was starting virtual learning this year. Let me tell you the quality is great. The cushion around the ears makes them super comfortable. It is loud enough that he doesn't always have to wear them around his ears. He can put them on a stand and hear just fine. The cord is long enough and it's light weight. I am going to order another pair for my other son. Everyone at my house loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last - I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these for the 4 weeks he could use them. After just 4 weeks and they have stopped working. Return window closed. Very disappointed, too much to pay for something that lasted such a short time. EDITED: the company contacted me after I wrote this review and offered to replace our non-functioning headphones. The quality is the same, as to be expected for the price but my son is very happy to have functioning headphones again. I appreciate the company's dedication to their customers, I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Saraya

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, mic didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these headphones for the sound quality. They fit an adult and a child comfortably. My son loves the way they look and uses them often. The only disappointment is that the microphone doesn't work with our Xbox one gaming. Even though he can't talk during live gaming with this headset, he loves wearing them and thinks the sound is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Great headsets at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my 16 year old and he was so excited to get them! The mic is clear and how the lights illuminate is super cool. This seems to meet his gaming needs and the price is right. They fit comfortably on his head. He is very happy with them. P.s. The volume control apparatus is perfect because he can tune me out when I’m yelling at him to do his chores. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: MEL A

customer_reviews.title: Good price works but not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Good price sounds not very as I expected on loud on loudest setting but does what I meet it to do also while using xbox you can’t plug lighting in since the two cords are only 6 inches apart to power up the light you need a USB port with your headset plugged in to the controller you can’t reach the Xbox since the cords are only 6 inches apart.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Value ,Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: *Using for Xbox One gaming (No adapter required if you have 3.5mm headphone jack). Love em! Highly recommended. Sound quality is awesome and it is a game changer for online gaming. Headset feels great even after hours of gameplay. Note: LED lights only work when powered by USB and the usb and headphone cables are right next to each other. This headset would be awesome for PC gaming as well but it will require a headphone splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the serious gamer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my best friend after the last one (different brand) broke a few months after I bought it. Recipient loves it, says it is even better than the initial one I bought him. He is thrilled with it. Item was exactly as described by seller. Arrived on time and intact. Will recommend and order from again.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very cool headset
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He uses them for remote learning. I can’t hear any of the third graders while I’m focusing on getting work done in the same room. He had been using them for gaming also. I had to place a hand on his shoulder to get his attention, but the noise cancelling is working. I am hoping he gets many years of use out of these.
customer_reviews.author: cav0011

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This was to be for my son online school use. When testing it you can't hear when he talks unless he yells. The headset is suppose to light up. The cord is so short you have to pick for the headset to lightup or for the headset to be useful with any input or output. Will be packing them back up and getting my money back. Cheap pair from Walmart works better.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very good set
customer_reviews.text: I have tested this head set for a long time now and with constant use I have not had a single issue. Fit is very comfortable. Barely any out side sound comes in if any. Mic sensitivity is perfect balance. Only draw back is USB plug for the lights. Cord is a bit long so if your a console player it's more likely to be bunched up next to you. Well worth the price and i use them more then my turtle beaches and after glow. Forgot to mention I been using these on xbox one
customer_reviews.author: arcanum

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it’s pretty decent!
customer_reviews.text: The sound did surprise me when I first tried them out. Several months into use, began having issues with popping noise and would have to disconnect and reconnect to controller. The comfort level is okay, after about 6 hours of playing they begin to irritate the ears, but it’s not terrible. The long cord is a plus, never had issue of accidentally pulling the cord out when moving around like the other sets I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Blackwell 315

customer_reviews.title: Much for your Money!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of these headphones that I have bought. I have paid hundreds of dollars for headsets for my boys and these are by all means just as good!! I bought the first pair for my 9 year old and both of his older brothers, 15 and 18 who had expensive headsets, ended up stealing his because one thing or another went wrong with theirs... now all 3 of the boys have them and they love them! BTW, one plays PS4, one Xbox One and the other PC.... these work AWESOME on all three systems!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE SCHARMER

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really fast shipping. Product seems solid for the money. Son says they sound VERY good and he's no longer experiencing a sound lag he had with a prior mic. Says they are comfortable. One drawback is he connects through xBox One controller and so we would need a USB extension cable to the console or a micro converter to the controller in order to allow him to use the LED lights. No biggie, really, and at this point he says he doesn't care about ordering either and is just going with no lights. After looking more extensively through the reviews and product information, this tip is there, I just didn't see it before I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So with multiple kids and distance learning being the norm this year, we needed to find a way for the kids to attend without interrupting each other. To that end, so far this headset has been great. Nothing but praise coming from my eldest daughter who is not being distracted by her sister and can now clearly communicate with her class. We have not yet used it in a gaming capacity, but I intend to resolve that as soon as possible. Given the price point, I'm very satisfied with what we've received.
customer_reviews.author: Max Z

customer_reviews.title: Good set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Though noise cancellation is not all that great, the sound quality is amazing. Only other drawback is when using with the PS4, you are not able to use the LED function which looks cool in the product photos. I was going to send them back but the sound quality was too amazing and the comfort of the pads on your ears is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stryfe

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Lasts a good amount of time
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Bought in 2016 for the first time and they've lasted until now 2019 and honestly its only cuz my 2 yr old got a hold of them and started chewing on the jacks. So i decided to get another pair. It says they are KOTION EACH like my first pair but it says you need to buy a splicer so a little concerned i wont be able to play with them on my ps4 right away until i buy that piece. The only down side was the usb that makes them light up has to plugged into the console itself so you only have about 6ft of range
customer_reviews.author: Heatherfeather

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think they would actually work as good as the reviews said but I was wrong. The noise cancellation works great I love the bright color blue when it lights up. Also, you can hear the person sneaking up on you in Modern Warfare that's a great feature to have. Now I get more kills because of this. The only drawback is you need to purchase an additional adapter piece in order for the headset to light up while your playing on you PS4 but not for your PC or laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Renada B

customer_reviews.title: This headset is the most comfortable headset out there!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this product! The quality itself was worth a five star! It was so amazing and I have no Idea why you would not buy this headset! It was $30 dollars and definitely worth it. I have never gotten a better headset before on amazon! If you are going back and forth about this product it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamal

customer_reviews.title: I Can Hear YOU!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headset....but....and this is totally just my opinion. IF I want to use my lights on the headset while on the PS4, I need an extension to plug in the USB. The USB plug in has NO impact on the headset working. I figured, what the hell, it lights up sooo why not use it. Works GREAT on my PC as well as my PS4. Nice clear sound. Volume control is on cord which makes it easy to either turn it up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months - UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it is a nice product with good sound. But mine quit working completely after 6 months of use. UPDATE: Almost immediately after posting this review, I was contacted by the seller. They helped me troubleshoot the item to determine that it was indeed defective and shipped me a replacement at no cost. Within a few days of this original post, I had a new pair arrive at my house. It was unfortunate that the original headset stopped working but this item comes with some amazing costumer service. I was very impressed with how they handled the situation. Thank you so much for replacing the item so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Update: the company replaced my defective headset. At first they wanted me to pay for shipping and refused, and was content to let the 1-starvreview sit. However, another representative reached out and offered to replace the headset. The new one has worked as expected without any issues. I subtracted one star because the first unit was defective.
customer_reviews.author: MindPrints

customer_reviews.title: Mic stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Update: I reached out to seller and they shipped a new headset. This was a hassle free warranty replacement! My son is very happy! ----‐----------- This didnt even last a year! I bought this for my son in January & the mic stopped working a few weeks ago, so its useless for his online gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Ms B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Headset
customer_reviews.text: My previous headset broke, I had to get a new one. I found this one on Amazon because I really liked the color of it and it also came with a mic. The headset seems heavy, but it actually is light enough that it sits comfortably on your head. you can adjust the volume through the wire, and you can turn the mic on/off manually. The mic works without any problems. The sound the headset provides is very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mao

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my kid who loves gaming when i first bought them and he used them on his xbox one they didnt work he could hear but not speak into them so i read reviews to buy the adapter i bought it still didnt work totally sucks they look nice but dont serve the purpose they were purchased for very disappointed. Update I was contacted by the seller and give a full refund since i was unsatisfied with their product. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Arzate

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Value Priced
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son so we didn't have to yell back and forth from the living room and bedroom while playing on the xbox. The headphones are super comfortable and the in game sound and voice chat are crystal clear. The only reason I'm leaving a four star instead of five star review is that while playing on xbox one, the USB does not attach and just hangs there off of the controller and the cool blue led lights will not come on. This in no way affects in game sound or chat. The blue lights are just cosmetic. They look cool if you are connecting the headphones to your pc or desktop.-Ryan S.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were a christmas gift to me in 2018. I have used them for over a year now and they are an excellent buy for the price. Great sound quality, fairly light weight, great noise canceling, mic functions very well. They are fairly durable as well I travel alot for work and I bring them with me in my laptop bookbag. They get banged around and stuffed under airplane chairs, no cracks or breaks. Would absaloutly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sound great, looks great too.
customer_reviews.text: The headset is comfortable to wear for extended periods. I also like that it doesn't completely block exterior sound while being worn. My only complaint is that the control molded onto the cord is too close to the headset, so it can't lay on my desk & is always adding that little extra bit of weight to the left side, forcing me to clip the cord to my collar.
customer_reviews.author: Reason_trumps_emotion

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son used this for his Xbox one and sadly it has lasted less than a month and no one can hear him when he uses it and he can barely hear his friends. Looks great but shoddy workmanship. 1/14/19-update. The company replaced my son’s headset on 12/7/18. They were extremely helpful and kept up with me via email to ensure that the replacement headset was in working condition. The headset works very well as promised. I was so happy with the headset and also the customer service I received that I ordered an additional headset for my friends son for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Maia Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price its a very good headset. Friends say that my mic quality is very clear. Audio is not the best, it is a bit bassy, but again for the price really cannot complain. However, the cord is super long, they have a velcro loop so you can bundle it. It also has a dangling USB cord, but no to big of a deal since I only use it for the PS4. All in all 8 out of 10 rating.
customer_reviews.author: CoolBlue

customer_reviews.title: First headset shorted out. Ended up receiving a new one for free.
customer_reviews.text: They were awesome at first. Pretty decent sound quality. Very comfortable. But I hadn't even been using them 2 months and they started shorting out where they connect to the controller. :( Update: a customer service representative contacted me about my review and asked a few more questions about the problem. After describing the issue with a little more detail, they ended up shipping out a new headset free of charge, and so far this one has been working great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Great for Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these headphones, they're great. They are no Turtle Beaches or Astros, but for only $40, they have great sound quality, and they feel good on your ears even after a couple straight hours of gaming. They have a lot of durability, my last pair lasted me for two years before they got damaged while I was moving back up to college. Only complaint is that at times they can be a little too loud and the sound can leak out into the microphone, although this happened rarely and only on certain games (like Apex Legends and COD Modern Warfare). Overall, great piece of equipment for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanee Edenfield Berry

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our kiddo for Easter. He loves them, however occasionally the microphone piece quits working for a while then will suddenly work again. Also we were bummed that in order to have them glow they have to be plugged in. Thought that was a charging situation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: Needed a gaming headset for my PS4 for voice chat with my friends. The reviews for this looked pretty good, the price was reasonable, and it had what I was looking for. It got here pretty quickly which was nice. It was easy to set up, just plug and play. It was very easy for me to test the mic and adjust the volume settings. It works great. Voice comes through clearly and I'm able to hear my friends when they're chatting as well. It's a great gaming headset and I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great...when they work (see ETA as well)
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work great when they work. The mic intermittently stops working on my son’s Nintendo Switch all the time, however. Very frustrating. Would not purchase again. Past the return window. ETA (3/8/19) The seller reached out to me and sent me a new set of headphones. Working perfectly so far. Will update again if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Head Phones for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: He loves them!! He uses them constantly playing Fortnite. He even got his buddy to buy the same pair so they could communicate in their games. It really has been great with the quarantine for him to have an outlet to spend time with his friends. One of the best things I have bought him.
customer_reviews.author: Brittania Morris

customer_reviews.title: Greenlight for Gamers!!!! 🟢🟢🟢
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My son loves it! He said it definitely cancels all noise 😁 and the sound from the game is amplified 👌🏽 He also said he wasnt able to use the mouthpiece part of the headphones because it needs an adapter. Note taken😏 Overall kiddo and hubby are very pleased. Thanks for this awesome deal!
customer_reviews.author: Shymira Crowley-Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Great ps4 headset!
customer_reviews.text: Great ps4 headset! and for this price you cant beat it. No static from my mic to other players. Ive previously bought a different one in same price range and almost same look and this one is the winner I will buy if my bunny decides to chomp the cord like it did to the other one I had.
customer_reviews.author: ellen

customer_reviews.title: Clear mic and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This headset are amazing. I bought it for my son to play video games and he loved it. He said the sound quality is amazing and the mic is super clear. The mic barely picks up any background noise and only focuses on your voice. The headphones feel great. The side cushions on the earpiece makes him able to wear it without any trouble. These gaming headset is perfect for someone on a budget trying to get a decent gaming headset. I might buy another one for my 2nd eldest son.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The Gift That Never Fully Worked 😡
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my son as a Christmas gift & upon receiving it the USB cord was smashed in so bad my husband had to pry It open, also the LED lights are not working. Now 4 days after Christmas there is static in the headphone set, this is the 1 draw back about ordering online (when something needs to be returned) who has time for the return process. That’s supposed to be the convenience of ordering online.
customer_reviews.author: Janiya Bray

customer_reviews.title: They are very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was the second pair I purchased from amazon because the first pair didn't work so my gut said to try this one for my son's gaming. Not only does it block out the sound but the led lights are so cool and my son loves to see them light up! I would highly recommend these headphones because you are definitely paying for good quality headphones and the capability has such a wide range. He is able to use them with every system he has and that is a major plus for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a family member. So, far he loves it!! Comfortable on the ears. Great sound. Mic works great. He likes the mute feature. 6ft cord. Led lights only works when USB is plugged in. Comes with a split adapter for dual usage. Con: plug does not fit into our S10e phone.
customer_reviews.author: Luvume

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and sound great.....
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write my review until after my 6 year old grandson had used these for a while and I am happy to report that after several months of a lot of not-always-so-gentle usage, these headphones are still working and working well! They sound great and are built to last. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: danigirl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good. Comes with a microphone that has an adjustable position. It glows when you plug it in, wish it had an option to turn off the light. You can adjust the sound volume and turn the microphone on and off. The headphones are adjustable so it fits both my boyfriend and I, however, it is still a little bit large on me. Not fully soundproof. Comfortable and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Ribali

customer_reviews.title: Initial issue fixed in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and sound is awesome. I ordered one initially, but had a problem with the microphone. after leaving a review the company contacted me personally and sent me a brand new one in a speedy manner. New headset works great and they handled it very professionally. Definitely recommend, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headset for my son's Nintendo Switch because I was tired of hearing all the shooting and kids yelling while playing Fortnite. Came in super fast, was well packaged. My son loves it and so do I. Now I have to go wherever he's at to get his attention because he can't hear me yelling at him, so the noise cancellation obviously works. He loves the sound quality and they look pretty sturdy so should hold up for a while. The ear piece is soft and the mic are also made well, not flimsy. I've bought my kids quite a few headsets over the years and this brand has not disappointed yet. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Mags

customer_reviews.title: Good gaming headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son to use while gaming, and he really likes them! He said the sound is really good, and that they do have good noise cancellation... especially when playing next to his brother. He also said they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: Fine but wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought to be able to use a mic playing FPS games on an Xbox One and have also started using them so that I don’t have to have the sound come out of the TV. Both mic and sound quality are just okay. Fine started headset but you’d probably benefit from paying a little more money for something higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought 3 headphones in the past several months and the microphone just stops working. I paid for the asurion warranty but they refer me to manufacture warranty in which I have no information to reach out. These appear to have a defect regarding the microphones. Update: the seller did reach out and send another pair of headphones in an attempt to make it right. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Wallace

customer_reviews.title: pretty good, but. . .
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent. I don't like the USB connector which is used only to power the LED lights and the sound input and microphone are all on the same stereo connector which doesn't work on my PC. (The stereo and microphone are two separate connections)
customer_reviews.author: Chris Shipman

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got this headset for my son. He loves the feel because it fits around his ear instead of on his ear. Sound is pretty good, not able to really test it with loud deep bass but if I have any issues I will update my listing. great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for an even better price!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for about a week but so far I'm very happy with this headset. While they're quite a bit bulkier than I anticipated, they're extremely comfortable and even when I wear my glasses, the earpieces do not push my glasses into the side of my head. My fellow glasses wearers know exactly what I'm talking about! The sound quality is excellent, too. I use these on my PS4 and do not have close access to the USB plug, so I haven't been able to really test out the lights to see how they look while gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY SOUND. Low volume.
customer_reviews.text: Not super happy with these but they will work in a pinch. Sound quality is bad and volume is low. They are HUGE and bulky too, if they were better quality that wouldn’t matter though. Really excessive size for crap sound. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Monetlily2

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: this product broke after 8 weeks....the lights worked and that was about it. So i opened the control box with the volume knob and half the wires were not connected (faulty solder joints) and they coat it with a plastic coating so you cant resolder.... will never buy again super shotty.
customer_reviews.author: Oly

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair that I’ve bought. I use both pairs and I love them. These are a great deal. You don’t hear anything but what you are playing. If you’re playing Apex Legends you can hear footsteps and you’re going to be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Sound nice and look nice
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these at work for about a year at a call center and they're great as far as I can tell. They muffle out the sound of everyone else around me and they're not bad looking. I'm actually buying a second pair because I accidentally dropped the first pair and broke something on the inside
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Awesome head set
customer_reviews.text: My 11yr old son picked the headset all on his own .. he was very excited to get them . They looked sturdy and very gamer looking the colors are vivid .. lights up as well while connected ... it must be sound proof bc when I talk to him it’s like I’m not even there. He says they are awesome and uses them alllllll the time.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Z. Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are really good for your money. I was worried they wouldn't be that great because of the price. My son loves them and it is a great way for him to talk to his friends since they cannot play with each other in person.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this headset. He says it cancels out our voices while he is playing with his friends. Lol. It has been the best of all the headsets he has had (even more expensive ones). Will definitely recommend and purchase again when needed. Might buy one for his sister.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette A. Douget

customer_reviews.title: He says it has great sound quality and the mic sounds clear on his ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset once my son stole my headset and I decided to be the adult and not fight him over it. He loves it! He says it has great sound quality and the mic sounds clear on his friends' end. He has talked it up so much that I may just get one for myself. Would recommend, but my son keeps beating me to it.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of Giants

customer_reviews.title: Headset is super comfortable fits over ear
customer_reviews.text: Headset is super comfortable fits over ear. The only issue is the headset should explain the USB cable is only for the lights. Also they should include the adapter to have the headphones and mic merged to one 1/8 jack otherwise the jacks only work one at a time. These things are inconvenient when not fully expressed in the product description and detailed. Definitely not plug and play as expected when using on the PC. Other than those issues, the mic works great and the sound is good for the price. Once I fixed the Jack and plug in issues I have been thoroughly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, Looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This affordable headset sounds great, looks awesome, and really immerses you into your games. The only problem is now I can't hear my wife when she calls me to do something. Wait.. is that a problem? Recommended for sure :D
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and budget friendly for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Child uses it for online classes and games on an X box. He had minor connection issues with the xbox one but eventually figured it out. One downside, the usb cable that allows it to light up is too close to the other plug in. You have to therefore sit too close to the xbox to use the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buck! HIGHLY recommended
customer_reviews.text: Used it with my PS4 and it did great. Sound quality is great, love the easy volume control and noise canceling features. Not completely deaf from outside noise but enough to hear whats happening around you. Light weight and the great cushion support on ears and on top of your head which means comfort for extended period of time which means longer gaming time. You can not bend the mic though which sits awkwardly to the front, if not positioned right you can see it with your peripheral. And the USB plug for the lights should have made longer too. But other than
customer_reviews.author: RoiAbcede

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a birthday gift. It has been over four months had nothing on them has broke yet, with my teenage boys that’s really saying a lot. The microphone is adjustable as well as the headband. The cool blue lighting is just a bonus to the gamer experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.text: aaaaomg i love it, i thought that for the price they would be pretty bad, but really these headphones are amazing and work so well. you can choose weather or not you want the lights on, but i keep them on just because why not. the cord is long and i love them so much im v glad i bought these thankyou
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: The worst headphones ever.
customer_reviews.text: We have owned these less than 6 months and they do not work. Just after the 30 day return window the lights stopped working. Now 45 days later the mic stopped working and mouthpiece split in two. Amazon cannot help and there is no Response from the manufacturer. So disappointed in this purchase and quality of this item.
customer_reviews.author: ann b

customer_reviews.title: This headset is amazing. It’s not simply for gaming either
customer_reviews.text: This headset is amazing. It’s not simply for gaming either. The sound quality is genuinely good especially for the price. It is a bit bulky, and the cable, while very sturdy, Is firmly attached to the set. All and all I would say this is a very quality purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: ... Amazon gift card and loves them but does not like that he can’t use the lights
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old bought these with his Amazon gift card and loves them but does not like that he can’t use the lights. It’s not that they don’t work but in order for him to use them he has to extremely close to his TV due to the lights are powered by an extremely short USB that must be plugged into the console in order to work. You would need a USB extension or something if you like to use the lights on the headset and sit at a safe distance from your TV.
customer_reviews.author: NT0608

customer_reviews.title: as comfortable or more so than actual Sony headphones
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfull headset, as comfortable or more so than actual Sony headphones. Sound quality is great, we are hearing sounds in the games that we did not know were there, and love the lights. MIc is great, easy to move, and is seems to be very sturdy. Will buy again when one needed. Will recommend to others as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Tangles a lot but good
customer_reviews.text: I like the headset and the lady everything is good it is very comfortable but the only thing that I did not like about it was how the cord kept on getting tangled in every time I untangled one part of the cord another part would get tangled and now all of the parts that are getting tangled or permanent and I can never get it untangled
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how nice these headphones are! I am so glad I didn't spend $100 at GameStop on some headphones when these cheap headphones sound amazing, are super lightweight and comfy to wear. I would definitely purchase again and recommend this to a friend. I plug them into my PS4 remote and can easily adjust sound with the built in volume control
customer_reviews.author: Clohse

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for my kids online schooling
customer_reviews.text: In time like this need things for the kids that are comfortable its not to hard on the ears the noise cancellation is awesome because my kids get distracted easily other noise around them I recommend this not just for gaming
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headset!
customer_reviews.text: This headset replaced my more expansive R@zor Gaming Headset, that gave me serious static & feedback. I plugged these in & no static & no feedback. Tells you brand names are not always the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Labor

customer_reviews.title: Great for Zoom Calls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my hearing impaired son to wear during his virtual school calls that he could wear OVER his ears since he wears hearing aids. He hadn't complained about discomfort having to wear both together and he can hear much better.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Osman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: works great for my 11 year old son when he plays COD and other games. We had some issues with the mic at first but we're working to get that fixed. Overall great purchase, good quality and happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and noise cancellation but are big and bulky. Had trouble with windows 10 not keeping the headset as my default. Sometimes Windows couldn't find it at all. My Mac laptop had no such problem.
customer_reviews.author: snapshooter

customer_reviews.title: Great sound/mic, needs USB extender for gaming console's to light up
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! Sound is great, mic picks up everything, cord is a nice length however, if you're looking to light up the headphones on anything other than a pc, you'll need a USB extender. There is 1 cord and near the end, there's a few inches of a double cord, one 3.5mm & 1 USB, you cannot separate them. We use them on a PS4, so we had to but the USB extender. Other than that, glad we bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

product_meta.title: VersionTECH. G2000 Stereo Gaming Headset for PC, Xbox One, PS4, Nintendo Switch, Wired Gaming Chat Headphones with 3D Surround Sound, Noise-Cancellation Microphone，Volume Control & LED Lights
feature_bullets: 【Superb Compatibility for Multi-Platform】 Support PS4, PS4 Pro/Slim, Xbox One, Xbox One S/X controller, PC, Nintendo Switch/3DS, PSP, PS2, Game boy advance， Sega dreamcast， Laptop, Computer, Tablet, iPad, Mobile Phone. NOTE: old version Xbox One need extra adapter to support.

【Adjustable Noise-cancellation Microphone】 The gaming headsets are omnidirectional adjustable and flexible to pick up voice in 360 degree. External Audio Control： Mute button and volume control housed on military grade durable braided wire are designed conveniently for quick and convenient adjustment.

【Immersive in Super Real Gaming Experience】 High-grade 50mm driver with neodymium magnets delivers clean clear bass and acoustic positioning precision, you can feel the full force of an explosion, a grenade blast, or a dubstep drop. Perfect for Various Games: Like Halo 5 Guardians, Metal Gear Solid, Call of Duty, Star Wars Battlefront, Overwatch, World of Warcraft Legion, etc.

【Humanized Design, Built to Stay Comfortable】 The softly padded retractable headband design allows you to find the perfect fit without constraint and provide excellent durability, suits all gamers at any age. The synthetic leather-wrapped ear-cushions is thicker and bigger which ensures play-all-night comfort! PLUG & PLAY: No setup or installation necessary.

【Uniquely Designed Gorgeous Led Lights】 Big led lights designed on earcups is cool enough to maximizely blast the atmosphere of the whole game. The USB interface is only used to supply power to the LED lights on the earcups. NOTE：The product's LOGO "KOTION EACH G2000" has been updated as "VersionTECH." , so if you receive the product with the LOGO of "KOTION EACH G2000" or "VersionTECH.", it's the correct product.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars6,119 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
